mapper.insert: insert into project_message( pro_name, pro_type, pro_num, supervisor_unit, supervisor_unit_phone, construction_unit, construction_unit_phone, governor_unit, governor_unit_phone, pro_schedule, pro_status, pro_location, pro_summarize, pro_start_time, pro_end_time, reported_time, approval_time, notarize_time) values( #{proName}, #{proType}, #{proNum}, #{supervisorUnit}, #{supervisorUnitPhone}, #{constructionUnit}, #{constructionUnitPhone}, #{governorUnit}, #{governorUnitPhone}, #{proSchedule}, #{proStatus}, #{proLocation}, #{proSummarize}, #{proStartTime}, #{proEndTime}, #{reportedTime}, #{approvalTime}, #{notarizeTime})
